attributes.additional_details: I would like the government to suspend council tax to each house hold and fund the council directly. The government are offering statuary sick pay to all employees who are self- isolating £94.25 and continue paying council tax. A large proportion will be deducted leaving families with less to survive on.
attributes.background: Council tax freeze for the duration 6 - 12 months while we deal with COVID-19

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303274

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
